arts.sum: Gabriel opened the scoring with a powerful header from Declan Rice â€™s free-kick, Martinelli followed with a picture-perfect curling finish into the bottom corner, and Viktor Gyokeres added two clinical poacherâ€™s goals, ensuring Arsenal kept their 100% record in the Champions League intact. Just a day after complaining about the lack of hot water at the Emirates during training, Diego Simeone â€™s side found themselves in hot water over a thirteen-minute spell, conceding four goals in a 4-0 defeat to Arsenal.
